title: Be Happy
description: Vegans please inquire about options and inform HappyCow. Specializes in thin crust pizzas, pastas with sauces made in-house, fresh green salads, sandwiches on fresh baked brown bread, desserts, and serves espresso coffee. Offer a raw vegan cheesecake, as well as a wheat free chocolate cake. They wash their salads and fruit in mineral water and offers water refills from their UV/RO water purifier. Has Wi-Fi. The cafe is run by an Indian man and his Canadian wife.
streetAddress: front of Vietnamese Temple, far corner of Kalachakra Ground
